short.ar: تلخيص أو تحليل مقاطع فيديو Youtube™، وتحسين عمليات البحث في Google™ وBing™ باستخدام Gemini™
short.am: የዩቲዩብ ቪድዮዎችን ማጠቃለል ወይም መተንተን፣ Google™ እና Bing™ ፍለጋዎችን በጌሚኒ ™ አሻሽል
short.bg: Обобщете или анализирайте Youtube™ видеоклипове, подобрете Google™ и Bing™ търсения с Gemini™
short.bn: Youtube™ ভিডিওগুলির সারসংক্ষেপ বা বিশ্লেষণ করুন, Gemini™ এর সাথে Google™ এবং Bing™ অনুসন্ধানগুলি উন্নত করুন
short.ca: Resumeu o analitzeu vídeos de Youtube™, milloreu les cerques de Google™ i Bing™ amb Gemini™
short.cs: Shrnutí nebo analýza videí Youtube™, vylepšení vyhledávání Google™ a Bing™ pomocí Gemini™
short.da: Opsummer eller analysér Youtube™-videoer, forbedr Google™- og Bing™-søgninger med Gemini™
short.de: Youtube™-Videos zusammenfassen oder analysieren, Google™- und Bing™-Suchen mit Gemini™ verbessern
short.el: Σύνοψτε ή αναλύστε βίντεο YouTube™, βελτιώστε τις αναζητήσεις Google™ και Bing™ με το Gemini™
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Summarise or Analyse Youtube™ videos, enhance Google™ and Bing™ searches with Gemini™
short.es,es_419: Resuma o analice videos de Youtube™, mejore las búsquedas en Google™ y Bing™ con Gemini™
short.et: Võtke kokku või analüüsige Youtube™ videoid, täiustage Google™-i ja Bing™-i otsinguid Gemini™-iga
short.fa: ویدئوهای Youtube™ را خلاصه یا تجزیه و تحلیل کنید، جستجوهای Google™ و Bing™ را با Gemini™ بهبود بخشید.
short.fi: Tee yhteenveto tai analysoi Youtube™-videoita, tehosta Google™- ja ​​Bing™-hakuja Gemini™-sovelluksella
short.fil: Ibuod o Suriin ang mga video sa Youtube™, pahusayin ang mga paghahanap sa Google™ at Bing™ gamit ang Gemini™
short.fr: Résumez ou analysez des vidéos Youtube™, améliorez les recherches Google™ et Bing™ avec Gemini™
short.gu: Youtube™ વિડિઓઝનો સારાંશ અથવા વિશ્લેષણ કરો, Gemini™ સાથે Google™ અને Bing™ શોધને વિસ્તૃત કરો
short.he: סיכום או ניתוח סרטוני YouTube™, שפר את החיפושים של Google™ ו-Bing™ עם Gemini™
short.hi: यूट्यूब™ वीडियो का सारांश या विश्लेषण करें, जेमिनी™ के साथ Google™ और Bing™ खोजों को बढ़ाएं
short.hr: Sažeti ili analizirati Youtube™ videozapise, poboljšati Google™ i Bing™ pretraživanja s Gemini™
short.hu: Összegezze vagy elemezze Youtube™ videókat, javítsa a Google™ és Bing™ kereséseket a Gemini™ segítségével
short.id: Ringkas atau Analisis video Youtube™, sempurnakan penelusuran Google™ dan Bing™ dengan Gemini™
short.it: Riepiloga o analizza i video di Youtube™, migliora le ricerche su Google™ e Bing™ con Gemini™
short.ja: Gemini™ で Youtube™ ビデオを要約または分析し、Google™ および Bing™ 検索を強化します
short.kn: Youtube™ ವೀಡಿಯೊಗಳನ್ನು ಸಾರಾಂಶಗೊಳಿಸಿ ಅಥವಾ ವಿಶ್ಲೇಷಿಸಿ, Gemini™ ಜೊತೆಗೆ Google™ ಮತ್ತು Bing™ ಹುಡುಕಾಟಗಳನ್ನು ವರ್ಧಿಸಿ
short.ko: YouTube™ 비디오 요약 또는 분석, Gemini™로 Google™ 및 Bing™ 검색 강화
short.lt: Sudarykite arba analizuokite Youtube™ vaizdo įrašus, patobulinkite Google™ ir Bing™ paieškas naudodami Gemini™
short.lv: Apkopojiet vai analizējiet Youtube™ videoklipus, uzlabojiet Google™ un Bing™ meklēšanu, izmantojot Gemini™
short.ml: YouTube™ വീഡിയോകൾ സംഗ്രഹിക്കുക അല്ലെങ്കിൽ വിശകലനം ചെയ്യുക, Gemini™ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് Google™, Bing™ തിരയലുകൾ മെച്ചപ്പെടുത്തുക
short.mr: Youtube™ व्हिडिओंचा सारांश किंवा विश्लेषण करा, Gemini™ सह Google™ आणि Bing™ शोध वाढवा
short.ms: Ringkas atau Analisa video Youtube™, tingkatkan carian Google™ dan Bing™ dengan Gemini™
short.nl: Vat of analyseer Youtube™-video's samen, verbeter Google™- en Bing™-zoekopdrachten met Gemini™
short.no: Oppsummer eller analyser Youtube™-videoer, forbedre Google™- og Bing™-søk med Gemini™
short.pl: Podsumuj lub analizuj filmy z YouTube™, usprawnij wyszukiwanie w Google™ i Bing™ dzięki Gemini™
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Resuma ou analise vídeos do YouTube™, aprimore pesquisas no Google™ e Bing™ com Gemini™
short.ro: Rezumați sau analizați videoclipuri YouTube™, îmbunătățiți căutările Google™ și Bing™ cu Gemini™
short.ru: Обобщайте или анализируйте видеоролики Youtube™, улучшайте поиск в Google™ и Bing™ с помощью Gemini™
short.sk: Zhrnutie alebo analýza videí Youtube™, zlepšenie vyhľadávania Google™ a Bing™ pomocou Gemini™
short.sl: Povzemite ali analizirajte videoposnetke Youtube™, izboljšajte iskanja Google™ in Bing™ z Gemini™
short.sr: Сажмите или анализирајте Иоутубе™ видео снимке, побољшајте Гоогле™ и Бинг™ претраге уз Гемини™
short.sv: Sammanfatta eller analysera Youtube™-videor, förbättra Google™- och Bing™-sökningar med Gemini™
short.sw: Fanya muhtasari au Changanua video za Youtube™, boresha utafutaji wa Google™ na Bing™ ukitumia Gemini™
short.ta: YouTube™ வீடியோக்களை சுருக்கவும் அல்லது பகுப்பாய்வு செய்யவும், Gemini™ மூலம் Google™ மற்றும் Bing™ தேடல்களை மேம்படுத்தவும்
short.te: Youtube™ వీడియోలను సారాంశం చేయండి లేదా విశ్లేషించండి, Gemini™తో Google™ మరియు Bing™ శోధనలను మెరుగుపరచండి
short.th: สรุปหรือวิเคราะห์วิดีโอ Youtube™ ปรับปรุงการค้นหา Google™ และ Bing™ ด้วย Gemini™
short.tr: Youtube™ videolarını özetleyin veya analiz edin, Gemini™ ile Google™ ve Bing™ aramalarını geliştirin
short.uk: Узагальнюйте або аналізуйте відео Youtube™, покращуйте пошук Google™ і Bing™ за допомогою Gemini™
short.vi: Tóm tắt hoặc phân tích các video Youtube™, nâng cao khả năng tìm kiếm trên Google™ và Bing™ với Gemini™
short.zh_CN: 总结或分析 Youtube™ 视频，使用 Gemini™ 增强 Google™ 和 Bing™ 搜索
short.zh_TW: 總結或分析Youtube™ 視頻，使用Gemini™ 增強Google™ 和Bing™搜尋

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Summary is supported for almost all websites (unless the wape has nothing useful to summarise). Additionally popular sites like Google, Bing, Youtube, Yahoo, Github we have custom prompts written for them.
long.en:
Beyond Bard - Google Bard chatbot as assistant on any website and Youtube video summarizing tool .

It uses google's BARD chatbot at backend.
For popular sites like Google, Bing, Youtube, Duckduckgo, Github there are custom prompts written to enhance the summary(or insights) experience. For all other sites it tries to generate a summary or insights of the content on the page as much as possible. We are continuously increasing support for different types of websites.

It ensures 100% privacy, none of your data is sent to any server.

Do send up request of any specific site or group of sites that you need if that's not already supported at https://github.com/ishandutta2007/beyond-bard-mini/issues


LEGAL:
Disclaimer: Beyond Bard app is not official Bard application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently and has no affiliation to Google .
long.kn,lt,ml,ta:
Beyond Bard - AI chatbot as assistant on any website and Youtube 
video summarizing tool .

It uses google's BARD chatbot at backend.
For popular sites like Google, Bing, Youtube, Yahoo, Duckduckgo, Github there are custom prompts written to enhance the summary(or insights) experience. For all other sites it tries to generate a summary or insights of the content on the page as much as possible. We are continuously increasing support for different types of websites.
Do send up request of any specific site or group of sites that you need if that's not already supported at https://github.com/ishandutta2007/beyond-bard-mini/issues
